 slip_stitch = slip_stitch  tapestry needle  flo = front loops only  polyester toy stuffing  blo = back loops only  = repeat the space in brackets the  stitch marker optional given number of times  = total number of stitches notes  amigurumi is usually stitched in the round and a yarn with no stretch is best  when changing colour yarn over the new colour and pull through on the stitch prior  generally the hook you use for amigurumi will be a smaller than for other crochet as you want the stitches tight  your gauge yarn thickness and hook size used will affect the size of your item my ava is approx 15cm tall 5 ¾ inches  for this pattern the following yarns were used the yarn is o wine = paintbox yarns cotton dk in col 444 raspberry pink exclusive to o blue = paintbox yarns cotton dk in col 434 marine blue lovecrafts com o light blue = paintbox yarns cotton dk in col 433 washed you can find it teal here o green = paintbox yarns cotton dk in col 430 grass green  i have
